statements: SELECT * FROM radiology_reports;
SELECT report_id, patient_name, report_date FROM radiology_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, report_date FROM radiology_reports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT report_text FROM radiology_reports WHERE patient_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT report_id, patient_name, image_url FROM radiology_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, patient_name, report_date, report_text, image_url FROM radiology_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM radiology_reports WHERE patient_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name FROM radiology_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT report_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM radiology_reports GROUP BY report_id HAVING total_reports > 1;
SELECT image_url, COUNT(*) AS image_count FROM radiology_reports GROUP BY image_url ORDER BY image_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM RadiologyReports;
SELECT report_text, report_date FROM RadiologyReports WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT report_text, report_date FROM RadiologyReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_text, report_date FROM RadiologyReports WHERE report_id = 456;
SELECT image_data FROM RadiologyImages WHERE image_format = 'JPEG';
SELECT * FROM RadiologyReports WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT report_id, report_text FROM RadiologyReports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT rr.report_id, ri.image_format FROM RadiologyReports rr INNER JOIN RadiologyImages ri ON rr.report_id = ri.report_id;
SELECT * FROM RadiologyImages WHERE image_format IN ('JPEG', 'PNG') ORDER BY image_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ri.image_id, rr.report_text FROM RadiologyImages ri LEFT JOIN RadiologyReports rr ON rr.report_id = ri.report_id;
SELECT * FROM radiology_reports;
SELECT report_id, patient_id FROM radiology_reports WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, report_text FROM radiology_reports ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY patient_age;
SELECT * FROM radiology_reports ORDER BY report_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, report_text FROM radiology_reports WHERE patient_id = 1001
SELECT report_id, image_data FROM radiology_images ORDER BY report_id ASC
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM RadiologyReports;
SELECT report_id, report_text, report_date FROM RadiologyReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, report_text FROM RadiologyReports WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name;
SELECT radiologist_name, specialty FROM Radiologists WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM RadiologyReports WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT report_text, report_date FROM RadiologyReports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, RadiologyReports.report_text FROM Patients JOIN RadiologyReports ON Patients.patient_id = RadiologyReports.patient_id;

SELECT Radiologists.radiologist_name, RadiologyReports.report_text, ReportImages.image_url FROM Radiologists JOIN RadiologyReports ON Radiologists.radiologist_id = RadiologyReports.report_id JOIN ReportImages ON RadiologyReports.report_id = ReportImages.report_id;
SELECT report_date, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM RadiologyReports GROUP BY report_date ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT * FROM radiology_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT report_id, report_text FROM radiology_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT physician_name, specialty FROM physicians WHERE specialty LIKE '%surgery%';
SELECT department_name, location FROM departments ORDER BY department_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM radiology_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT report_id, report_text FROM radiology_reports WHERE patient_id = 3 ORDER BY report_date DESC;

SELECT p.patient_name, r.report_text, i.image_type FROM patients p JOIN radiology_reports r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id JOIN images i ON r.report_id = i.report_id WHERE p.gender = 'F' ORDER BY r.report_date ASC;

SELECT department_name, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM departments d LEFT JOIN physicians p ON d.department_id = p.department_id LEFT JOIN radiology_reports r ON p.physician_id = r.physician_id GROUP BY department_name;

SELECT physician_name, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM physicians p LEFT JOIN radiology_reports r ON p.physician_id = r.physician_id GROUP BY physician_name ORDER BY total_reports DESC LIMIT 5;
